comment: Source of data to be digested.

methods.name: long size()
methods.comment: * Returns the size (in bytes) of the data offered by this source.

methods.name: void feedIntoDataDigester(DataDigester md, long offset, int size) throws IOException, DigestException
methods.comment:
* Feeds the specified region of this source's data into the provided digester.
     *
     * @param offset offset of the region inside this data source.
     * @param size size (in bytes) of the region.

methods.name: static DataSource create(@NonNull FileDescriptor fd, long pos, long size)
methods.comment:
* Creates a DataSource that can handle the passed fd in the most efficient and safe manner.
     * @param fd file descriptor to read from
     * @param pos starting offset
     * @param size size of the region
     * @return created DataSource object

methodNames: void feedIntoDataDigester(DataDigester md, long offset, int size) throws IOException, DigestException
